cmp: 出 (to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to occur/to happen/(a measure word for dramas, plays, or operas))

exm.mng: to count as number one (idiom); second to none, outstanding
Qu Yuan (340-278 BC), famous Warring States statesman and poet, author of Sorrow at Parting 離騷|离骚 Lisao in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞
to feel wronged, to nurse a grievance, to cause sb to feel wronged
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom), very few
